title: Il Trovatore by Giuseppe Verdi
creator_credit: Brian Adams, Australian Opera and Riccardo Pellizzeri
brief_description: Sung in Italian and with English sub-titles, this performance was recorded live at the Sydney Opera House, July 2, 1983 and is part of the popular ‘Esso night at the opera’. Performers include: Cynthia Johnston, Joan Sutherland, Jonathan Summers, Kenneth Collins. The Australian Opera (Sydney) conducted by Richard Bonynge. Staged by Elijah Moshinsky. Features the Australian Opera Chorus and Elizabethan Sydney Orchestra.
